question: 大学
sourceMnemonic: What's the <kanji>big</kanji> <kanji>study</kanji>? If I had to choose, I'd probably say this is <vocabulary>college</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>university</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic:
This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. Since <ja>大</ja> has two on'yomi readings, here's a mnemonic to help you remember which one to use:

Your <vocabulary>university</vocabulary> is best known for its <reading>dye</reading> <reading>gawk</reading>ing (<ja>だいがく</ja>). It's a sport in which you gawk at dye, and your university is the best at it! Other universities might be known for their football or basketball teams, but yours is the best at dye gawking.
